item.title: About me
item.description: Who am I? Well, this is me, trying to contain the urge to run over the frozen lake of Dedinky, Slovakia, which is something dangerous and stupid. I have always thought that this image describes very well how I am. I consider myself a restless, curious, especially positive and extroverted person. I like team-work and develop new projects. My main professional motivation is computer security, as you could have observed by the content of this blog.

item.title: DNS - Gathering information
item.description: Obtención de información de servidores DNS usando tecnicas como Snooping o transferencia de zona.

item.description: Denegación de servicio para servidores Apache con versiones inferiores a 7.0.28.
